Debrief.GUI.Tote.Painters.Highlighters

Interface PlotHighlighter

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Editable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    PlotHighlighter.RectangleHighlight, RangeHighlighter, SymbolHighlighter

    public interface PlotHighlighter
extends Editable
    Interface for classes which are able to draw a highlight at a particular point in time
    Version:
    1
    Author:
    IAN MAYO

    • Method Detail

      • highlightIt

        void highlightIt(PlainProjection proj,
                 java.awt.Graphics dest,
                 WatchableList list,
                 Watchable watch,
                 boolean isPrimary)
        Draw a highlight around this watchable
        Parameters:
        proj - the current projection
        dest - the place to draw this highlight
        watch - the current data point
        isPrimary - whether this is the current primary track
